Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the state of the game.

    • addPlayerAtArrayList

      public void addPlayerAtArrayList(String nickname, GoalDeck goalDeck, ArrayList<CommonGoal> commonGoal)
      Add new player, by nickname, in the player's list and creates the player's list of the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      goalDeck - deck from where players choose their personal goal
      commonGoal - list of common goals active in the match

    • takeObject

      public void takeObject(int[][] drawArray) throws Exception
      This method receives a list of coordinate that identifies where the player wants to draw and return a list of tileCard to put in the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      drawArray - list of coordinates
      Throws:
      Exception

    • placeObject

      public void placeObject(int column)
      Method that starts place object phase of the current player. Player has to choose column and the array of tiles to deposit. After this action, player's turn end and game changes the current player scanning the player's list.
      Parameters:
      column - int to identify the column of the bookshelf where player wants to put the drawn tiles

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      This method is used to change current player. Called after placeObject method.

    • calculateWinner

      public String calculateWinner()
      Method to calculate and set the winner.

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Method that check if next turn will be the last.
      Returns:
      true if the last turn will be the last
